column5: You know any with a fishable stream running through it....
I am not a religious man,however, IMHO,a newborn child is a refresher course on God. Congrats

Congrats Paul - that'll give ya something to focus on while you wait to see this view from your new toy (taken Thursday in Fla -- it was sooooooo nice to be on that water again)   in a couple years you can have the tike over, stuff him full of coke and chocolate just before you send 'em home with a smile..... and a few years after that you'll have a great fishing partner
I absoluetly Hate you dude !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm drooling over here.

WOW, glad I didn't show you any picturs of the outing then like the 5lb black grouper (was hoping for a 50lber, but no such luck that day)  or the days keepers....  or thefact that the restuarant cooked them up (for $5.00) and we ate in short sleeve shirts on the boardwalk, observing bikini clad scenery and sharing with anyone passing by  that would have been really unkind....
Thufferin thucatash
You're so kind Rick !!!
It's postings like this that will get you banned Spincast
8.54 am, my first god child came into this world !! 6lb15oz Ely-Rose in perfect healthMy Nephew and his Wife are in good shape. It is a humbling feeling. I better take a refresher course on God !!!
Congratulations uncle Paul
Poor kid really didn't luck out eh?  Congrats to you.
Congrat's Paul...
now youll have someone to watch Monty Python with  Congrates Paul...and try not to be too much of an influence on the kid....lmao
Congrads Godfather and don't forget to give the famous advice of "Never go against the family".....http://www.hark.com/clips/gqdfwpnggv-never-go-against-the-family-dot-dot-dot
Now i get to be called Dom Merc !!!  I make him an offer he don' refuse. Don' worry.
make sure u wash your fingers before u tickle the baby behind the ears
congrats merc.
Ron....i know you mean well, but i am so tired of being slammed about that by the bossman, i wish i had never started it Thanks for the Congrats though !!!  Paul
:rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:
thanks Doc. Its a really good feeling considering the wife and i have been trying to have our own for years.At least Godfather has the word father in it !!! She will be spoiled, i garrantiy it
some people are allergic to fun.
Certainly NOT me.....I learned a long time ago to have as much fun as possible....life's too short not to enjoy it....
Congrads! Just think, it could be worse, if you had a child it would be saying, "Goodness; thats my father!?"  I know mine do!
Congrats Godfather and keep your fingers out of the kids ears!!!
Congrates Paul And Spoil her well then send them home again  WHo Meeeee   I better quit
Congrats, Dom Paolo
Congratulations Paul !!!!!  "  Paul The God Father"

Hey I liked the "Ernest Goes" series so im sure i could sit through at least a few "Paul Becomes" shows.   Before you get any ideas of being rich on the big screen Paul  ..ill just tell ya ....i wont go to a theatre to see it   ...ill wait to download it for free  Did ya hear the one aboot the French Canadian COD Father? Instead of a horsehead... you get a fish head in your bed before ya get whacked...
GOOD ONE....LOL  :rofl2:
That woulda been funny if i was French, but in the words of Sting  I'm an alien I'm a legal alien I'm and englishman in Quebec.....
Hey dufass, I was referring to the fish head in bed....  I thought that was a clever line....
I really think you guys should get a room.
Truly!
